page.title: 05A WHEATHAMPSTEAD BOY
page.content: My name is Gavin Leonard.I am going to tell you about a day in my life.I get up and get dressed. I put on my pants,socks, black school trousers, my grey and white shirt and my school jumper.I put Gola trainers on.I go into the bathroom and wash with a yellow sponge and soap. I brush my teeth with blue minty gel toothpaste.I go down stairs and get my breakfast.I get ready and Jason calls for me at 8:30a.m and we go to school at 8:45a.m.We do maths in the morning.We go out to play at 10:30a.m and then we come back to class at 10:45a.m.Then we did English then we had play at 12:00p.m we have our dinner at 12:15p.m and play time ends at 1:15p.m and then we come back to class.We did our own topics.Then we had play time from 2:30p.m to 2.45p.m.
